name: Travellers with <Status> level should earn <Bonus> bonus points

testSteps.description: 1: Travellers with STANDARD level should earn 0 bonus points ({Status=STANDARD, Points Earned=100, Bonus=0})

children.description: Given Trevor is a Frequent Flyer Member with status STANDARD

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Sydney | Hong Kong | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then he should have earned 100 points

testSteps.description: 2: Travellers with BRONZE level should earn 25% bonus points ({Status=BRONZE, Points Earned=125, Bonus=25%})

children.description: Given Trevor is a Frequent Flyer Member with status BRONZE

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Sydney | Hong Kong | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then he should have earned 125 points

testSteps.description: 3: Travellers with SILVER level should earn 50% bonus points ({Status=SILVER, Points Earned=150, Bonus=50%})

children.description: Given Trevor is a Frequent Flyer Member with status SILVER

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Sydney | Hong Kong | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then he should have earned 150 points

testSteps.description: 4: Travellers with GOLD level should earn 100% bonus points ({Status=GOLD, Points Earned=200, Bonus=100%})

children.description: Given Trevor is a Frequent Flyer Member with status GOLD

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Sydney | Hong Kong | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then he should have earned 200 points

userStory.narrative:
Frequent Flyers earn status points each time they fly.
  As they earn more points, their status level increases and they get more benefits.

title: Travellers with <Status> level should earn <Bonus> bonus points
description: A flight from Sydney to Hong Kong normally earns 100 points

rule.name: Travellers with higher status earn more points
